pageTextData.title: Soda Wonder
pageTextData.subtitle: A wonderful selection of soda drinks
pageTextData.description: The Coca Cola Company is the worlds leading manufacturer, marketer and distributor of non-alcoholic beverage concentrates and syrups, and produces nearly 400 brands. NOTE: this website may take a while to load due to the size of the Sprite model

pageTextData.title: About
pageTextData.description: Welcome to Soda Wonder, where passion meets carbonation! At Soda Wonder, we're dedicated to celebrating the diverse world of sodas. Our mission is simple: to provide soda enthusiasts with a platform to explore, discover, and savor unique fizzy creations from around the globe. Whether you're a die-hard cola fan or an adventurous soda connoisseur seeking the latest craft concoctions, Soda Wonder is your go-to destination. Join us on a journey of flavor exploration, where every pop of the cap brings excitement and delight. From classic favorites to limited edition releases, we're here to quench your thirst for soda knowledge and appreciation. So, raise your glass and join us in raising the bar for soda enjoyment!

pageTextData.title: Statement of Originality
pageTextData.description: This assignment is submitted as part requirement for the degree of MSc Advanced Computer Science at the University of Sussex. It is the product of my own labour except where noted.
